p.s: The given extract of scene 4 of the drama Disgraced, Scene 4 written by Ayad Akhtar, published in 2012, is about the conversation of Amir and Abe after Abe was caught by the FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation.
After Hussein changed his name to Abe and wore typical American clothes to fit into the society, he changed his name back to Hussein and wears typical Muslim clothes.
He was caught by the FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation because they suspected Abe and his friend were part of a terror organisation.
The FBIFederal Bureau of Investigation then brought up his immigration status, which is up for renewal.
Amir wants to help Abe with calling the lawyer who was also the lawyer of Imam Fareed's case.
Abe doesn't want the help and instead argues about it with Amir.
